## setSwizzle4 variable

Sets `out[a] = v.x, out[b] = v.y, out[c] = v.z, out[d]=v.w`<!-- -->, returns `out`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSwizzle4: (out: Vec, v: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, a: number, b: number, c: number, d: number) => Vec
```
